name: Sweet Coconut Bread
author: philipp.wagner
ingredients: 4 ounces fresh cherries, pitted and cut into small pieces
1 tablespoon water, or more if needed
5 teaspoons white sugar, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Combine brown sugar, coconut, flour, raisins, fruit peel, cherries, baking powder, mixed essence, and nutmeg in a large bowl using a large wooden spoon
Combine margarine and shortening in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave until melted, 30 seconds to 1 minute
Pour melted mixture into flour mixture, alternating with milk, until batter is just mixed
Add water, a teaspoon at a time, if more moisture is needed
Pour batter into the prepared baking pans, smoothing the tops with the back of a wet spoon
Sprinkle white sugar over each loaf
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick or skewer inserted in the middle comes out clean, about 1 hour
Cool in the pans for 5 minutes
